_header: Caro dat lust and liking that lasts but awhile
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Satan; transitoriness, of world
_description: Macaronic lines on the gifts of the flesh, the world, the devil, and God in the Latin Sermones 13, sermon on ‘Seruire’ — two couplets

CamCCC423.Transcription:
Caro dat lust and and likyng þat lastis but a
                        whileMundus dat honore that mony a man doth
                        begileDiabolus dat payne and wooSed deus dat blisse
                    that lastis euermoo
CamCCC423.Note:
Included in Sermones 13 (beginning p. 159), the sermon on
                        ‘Seruire’ (beginning p. 207); preceded by 825.
